Articles.Content:
I've been watching around the forum for about two months now, and I figured I'd sign up for an account considering I have a ton of planes and rovers and stuff to upload and develop.

I noticed that I don't have an option to select an avatar on the profile editor, so I figure that I can kill two birds with one stone and post my image here.

Avatar:

(You may recognize this image from one

of the many Has Science Gone Too Far? parodies).

Hello AeroArchonite, and welcome to the forums!

You'll be able to set up an avatar after you have three posts approved by a moderator. Good to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Yes, what he said. I'd love to see your stuff- post it in the Spacecraft Exchange!

Welcome aboard!
Welcome aboard! We can't wait to see what you have to upload!
